Many tieflings born of Hellâ€™s fiery depths can call forth flames to sear their foes. The tiefling can cast @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.a2zXJ84rzkD8SIBe]{Overheat} as a spell-like ability. At 11th level, the scion can instead cast @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.WP0QPu6QvApGaQIG]{Explosive Blast} as a spell-like ability. The scion can invoke hellfire this way once per day.

This replaces deceitful and fiendish gloom.

After adding the spell to the Spellbook tab, edit the spell's Details, changing the Spell Preparation Mode to Innate Spellcasting, and change Limited uses to 1 of 1 Day. Use the formula(11 + @abilities.cha.mod) in the Saving Throw field for the Overheat spell-like ability. Use the formula(13 + @abilities.cha.mod) for the Explosive Blast spell-like ability
